attributes.comment:
I am writing about the proposed fee increases for filings of the Immigration and
Naturalization Benefit Application and Petition Fee Schedule (Biometrics and I-
600A). My husband and I have already received our I-171H form for our foreign
adoption. Due to the significantly increased wait in adoption of children from
China, we will have to refile our I-600A to the USCIS for updated fingerprinting and
forms. The proposed fee increases will result in an additional cost of $155 to us.
However, this is in addition to the costs we will incur already in having to have
these same forms redone. We are writing to respectfully request that the
proposed fee increases not be enacted. Please consider that we are already
paying considerable amounts of money to complete our adoption, and this poses
a significant, additional burden.

Thank you for providing us the opportunity to participate,

Cindy Brown
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cindy M Brown
